EmailTemplate.description: Email notifying paper applicants that a MyLSTM has been created for them.
EmailTemplate.name: New MyLSTM Account
EmailTemplate.subject: Your MyLSTM Account
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Student Number: {!Contact.LSTM_No__c}
We have created a MyLSTM account for you to pre-register online.
Your username is your personal email address.
For security reasons, your password will be sent in a separate email. Please check your spam folder if you have not already received this.
To access MyLSTM, go to:
https://mylstm.force.com/students/LSTMLogin
If you have any queries, please contact us via email at MyLSTM@lstmed.ac.uk.
Yours sincerely,
Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine
